NAME: A
LABEL: Bzone Population and Employment growth
INSTRUCTIONS: Keep all three Azone households constant.  For Bzones, compute growth (2045-2019) households (bzone_dwelling_units.csv).  Move some household growth from east to west such that, at the Bzone level, the average percent difference from baseline values is 48%.

LEVELS.LABEL: High population growth
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Higher household growth in selected bzones with average percent difference from baseline of 48%

LEVELS.LABEL: High Employment growth
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Higher employment growth in selected bzones with average percent difference from baseline of 136%

LEVELS.LABEL: High population and employment growth
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Combination of high population and high employment growth

NAME: C
LABEL: 2a. Azone population growth
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase growth in Azone population by 10% and corresponding Bzone households by 10%.

NAME: D
LABEL: 2b. Azone employment growth
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase growth in employment by 12% (must do this for all Bzones uniformly).

NAME: E
LABEL: 10a. Reducing transportation emissions
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase the proportion of hybrid cars and light trucks to simulate electric AVs

LEVELS.LABEL: High growth
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Higher proportion of hybrid cars and light trucks

NAME: F
LABEL: 10b. Reducing transportation emissions
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase the proportion of hybrid buses and paratransit vans.

LEVELS.LABEL: High growth
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Higher proportion of hybrid cars and light trucks

LEVELS.LABEL: Higher Efficiency
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Carbon intensity decreases in future year

NAME: H
LABEL: 10d. Reducing transportation emissions
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase the proportion of hybrid heavy trucks

NAME: I
LABEL: 10e. Reducing transportation emissions
INSTRUCTIONS: Decrease carbon intensity at point of consumption

NAME: J
LABEL: 3a. Telecommuting
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase Telecommuting by increasing EcoProp to 1.25%.

NAME: K
LABEL: 3c. Telecommuting
INSTRUCTIONS: Decrease the number of workers to reflect increased telework

NAME: L
LABEL: 4a. Alter household size
INSTRUCTIONS: Simulate larger and smaller household sizes in future year.

LEVELS.LABEL: Larger household size
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Increase average hh size, decrease one-person hhs, decrease number of children

LEVELS.LABEL: Smaller household size
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Decrease average hh size, increase one-person hhs, increase number of children

LEVELS.LABEL: More aging in place
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Higher number of older adults, higher proportion of 1-person hhs

LEVELS.LABEL: Less aging in place
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Lower number of older adults, lower proportion of 1-person hhs

NAME: O
LABEL: 5b. Transit
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase fuel tax and add tax for electric vehicles

LEVELS.LABEL: Higher taxes
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Increase fuel tax and add tax for electric vehicles

NAME: P
LABEL: 5c. Transit
INSTRUCTIONS: Increase fuel tax and add tax for electric vehicles, then increase transit supply

LEVELS.LABEL: Higher taxes and transit growth
LEVELS.DESCRIPTION: Increased fuel tax, tax for electric vehicles, transit supply
